simple

Class simple

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.simple

  • public class simple
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements a simple application that opens a 3D rendering window and shows a rotating cube.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  simple.AnimationTask
      A timer task that generates an animation.
      static class  simple.SimpleKeyListener
      A key listener for the main window.
      static class  simple.SimpleMouseListener
      A mouse listener for the main window of this application.
      static class  simple.SimpleRenderPanel
      An extension of GLRenderPanel or SWRenderPanel to provide a call-back function for initialization.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main function opens a 3D rendering window, implemented by the class simple.SimpleRenderPanel. simple.SimpleRenderPanel is then called backed for initialization automatically. It then constructs a simple 3D scene, and starts a timer task to generate an animation.
